name: Glaze (RomarioMartinus)
description:
Glaze is a Puzzle Platformer Game. a little girl lost in mysterious floating island, build the path to escape the island. Gamepad Supported and Mobile Touchscreen Supported. 

Thanks to:

GrafxKids - Enemies, Objects and Backgrounds

Alix - Tilesets

Kenney - Mobile UI

Eder Muniz - Trees And Bushes

Fez (for the inspiration)
